title: 9-year-old accidentally shot in North County, police say - KMOV.com
content:
NORTH ST. LOUIS COUNTY (KMOV.com) -
A child is expected to be okay after being accidentally shot in North County.
Police said the 9-year-old victim was accidentally shot in the foot with a rifle just before 11:00 p.m. The shooting occurred inside an apartment in the 4200 block of Cloverfield Trail.
It is unknown at this who fired the rifle. At this time, police do not have anyone in custody.
The investigation is ongoing.
